tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_collection_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  driver_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  truck_id INT NOT NULL,
  collection_points INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionRoutes (
  route_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  driver_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  truck_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE CollectionPoints (
  collection_point_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  point_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  latitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL,
  longitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL,
  point_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  route_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES WasteCollectionRoutes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionRoutes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  start_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  end_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  distance FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionSchedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT NOT NULL,
  collection_time DATETIME NOT NULL,
  is_completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES WasteCollectionRoutes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FuelConsumption (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT NOT NULL,
  fuel_used FLOAT NOT NULL,
  cost FLOAT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES WasteCollectionRoutes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionRoutes (
  route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id UUID,
  truck_id UUID,
  collection_date TIMESTAMP,
  start_location TEXT,
  end_location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CollectionLogs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  collection_date TIMESTAMP,
  route_id UUID,
  total_weight INT,
  fuel_consumed INT
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionRoutes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(50),
  driver_id INT,
  truck_id INT,
  start_location VARCHAR(100),
  end_location VARCHAR(100),
  distance_km DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Collections (
  collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  bin_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  collected_weight_kg DECIMAL
);
